entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

entities.name: aragog
entities.description: An Acromantula, a giant spider, who is being protected by Hagrid.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: A gamekeeper at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, who cares for Aragog and protects him from blame.

entities.name: mosag
entities.description: Aromantula, the wife of Aragog, introduced by Hagrid.

relationships.description: Hagrid protects Aragog from blame and harm.
Hagrid introduces Mosag to Aragog, his wife.
Aragog considers Hagrid as his good friend and a good man.
